Content: Hey y'all I've got a Honda cx 500 custom that I'm going to be buying from a buddy it was torn apart to replace the stator but my buddy got burned out and tired of messing with it so it'll be mine now. I was to it ran before it got taken apart so hopefully it will run after I put it back together! I'm sure I'll have lots of questions along the way

Title: 1981 Honda cx 500 c basket case to riding (hopefully)
